@sentry/node.reason: Tracked transitive minimatch advisory; upgrade path is blocked by upstream @sentry/node release compatibility testing.

gaxios.reason: Transitive dependency from googleapis stack; remediation scheduled with dependency refresh sprint.

glob.reason: Transitive minimatch advisory inherited via rimraf chain; tracked with root dependency refresh.
